tr.td: Co-I(s): Peter Pessev, Vincent Garrel, Claudia Winge, Benoit Neichel, Fabrice Vidal

body.div: As part of the Hubble Space Telescope Frontier Fields program, images of two galaxy clusters will be obtained with GeMS and GSAOI. Images of Abell 2744 and MACSJ0416.1-2403 in the K-band will be obtained. Gemini is planning to obtain approximately 5 hours on-source integration of each field, reaching an estimated (point-source) sensitivity of 26.3 AB mag (24.4 Vega) in K-band. These data will be immediately accessible in the Gemini Science Archive with no proprietary period, and we will also produce reduced images for the community after the observations are complete.

[data] [ADS] Gemini Frontier Fields: Wide-field Adaptive Optics Ks-band Imaging of the Galaxy Clusters MACS J0416.1-2403 and Abell 2744
